channel.title: ECHO - (One Shot)
channel.description:
GAME NAME - SYSTEM TITLE: ECHO NUMBER OF SESSIONS: One-shot DURATION: 3 Hours NUMBER OF PLAYERS: Total 4 ( GM-less game)
SPECIAL REQUEST: RSVP is reserved for the first 72 hours for players new to the Gauntlet, people of color, LGBTQIA, and non-he/him cis folks. CONTENT WARNING: Death, war, violence, loss/sadness, tragedy.
DESCRIPTION: ECHO = Peace after a great war. Kids playing in mech wreckage. A ghost. This is a GM-less storytelling and map-drawing game. We will define what the war was and the current world in play. No knowledge of the rules is needed.
SAFETY TOOLS IN USE: CATS, tone discussion, Lines & Veils, X Card, open door policy, and the Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct (https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html). RSVP OPEN ACCESS TIME: 12-12-20 8:00 PM PST SET UP INFO: Streamyard, Roll for your Party and Google Sheets BREAKS: 10 minutes on the hour. RECORDED: With permission granted PRIOR EXPERIENCE REQUIRED: No, rules will be taught in play.
https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MO97kqbhHiJ4stDEavk
